title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies        Firearms are prohibited at the Statue of Liberty National Monument and Ellis Island.        Proclamation 3656 Ellis Island became part of the Statue of Liberty National Monument and the National Park Service on May 11, 1965.  Read the full proclamation and see the original document here.          Proclamation 3656 added Ellis Island to the Statue of Liberty National Monument National Archives and Records Administration   |
